pageProduct.name: Andalou Willow Bark Pure Pore Toner 178ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Fruit stem cell complex with argan stem cells, kombucha probiotics, and aloe vera polysaccharides instantly hydrate with skin calming nutrients to soothe and gently balance pH as willow bark purifies pores for a clear, refreshed complexion.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Facial Toner For Active & Oily Skin Types

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Purified Water (Aqua), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate*, Vegetable Glycerin, Panthenol, Sodium PCA, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside, Fruit Stem Cells (Argan, Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive Berry Complex*, Epilobium Angustifolium (Willow Herb) Extract, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Salix Alba (Willow Bark) Extract*, Spiraea Ulmaria (Meadowsweet) Flower Extract*, Salicylic Acid, Saccharomyces Xylinum (Kombucha) Black Tea Ferment, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Extract*, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cinnamomum Camphora (Camphor) Bark Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Oil*, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Oil**Certified Organic Ingredients Fair Trade Ingredients

Directions

AM & PM. After cleansing, saturate cotton pad and gently sweep over face and neck.
